skchr_ascln_3.name: 降临
desc: Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, attack interval <@ba.vup>slightly reduced</>.Reduce accuracy of ground enemies in Attack Range by <@ba.vup>{attack@damage_hitrate_physical:0%}</>. Increase taunt level and restores {attack@hp_ratio:0%} of Max HP after enemies attack miss or Ascalon Dodge
